items.title: Open Secret: How NVIDIA Nemotron Models, Datasets and Techniques Fuel AI Development
items.raw_excerpt: Open technologies — made available to developers and businesses to adopt, modify and innovate with — have been part of every major technology shift, from the birth of the internet to the early days of cloud computing. AI should follow the same path. That’s why the NVIDIA Nemotron family of multimodal AI models, datasets and Read Article

title_i18n.en: Open Secret: How NVIDIA Nemotron Models, Datasets and Techniques Fuel AI Development
title_i18n.zh: 公开的秘密：英伟达Nemotron模型、数据集与技术如何推动人工智能发展
title_i18n.es: Secreto a voces: cómo los modelos, conjuntos de datos y técnicas de NVIDIA Nemotron impulsan el desarrollo de la inteligencia artificial

excerpt_i18n.en: Open technologies — made available to developers and businesses to adopt, modify and innovate with — have been part of every major technology shift, from the birth of the internet to the early days of cloud computing. AI should follow the same path. That’s why the NVIDIA Nemotron family of multimodal AI models, datasets and Read Article
excerpt_i18n.zh: 开放技术——供开发者和企业采纳、修改与创新——始终贯穿每一次重大技术变革，从互联网诞生到云计算兴起，人工智能时代亦不例外。
excerpt_i18n.es: Las tecnologías abiertas —disponibles para que desarrolladores y empresas las adopten, modifiquen e innoven con ellas— han formado parte de todos los grandes cambios tecnológicos, desde el nacimiento de internet hasta los primeros días de la computación en la nube. La inteligencia artificial.

items.title: This AI-Powered Robot Keeps Going Even if You Attack It With a Chainsaw
items.raw_excerpt: A single AI model trained to control numerous robotic bodies can operate unfamiliar hardware and adapt eerily well to serious injuries.

title_i18n.en: This AI-Powered Robot Keeps Going Even if You Attack It With a Chainsaw
title_i18n.zh: 这款AI动力机器人即使遭受电锯攻击也能持续运行
title_i18n.es: Este robot con inteligencia artificial sigue funcionando incluso si lo atacas con una motosierra.

excerpt_i18n.en: A single AI model trained to control numerous robotic bodies can operate unfamiliar hardware and adapt eerily well to serious injuries.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 单个经过训练的AI模型能操控多种机器人躯体，即使面对陌生硬件或严重损伤也能异常灵活地适应。
excerpt_i18n.es: Un único modelo de inteligencia artificial entrenado para controlar numerosos cuerpos robóticos puede operar hardware desconocido y adaptarse de forma inquietantemente eficaz a lesiones graves.

items.title: Launch HN: Flywheel (YC S25) – Waymo for Excavators
items.raw_excerpt:
Hey HN,
We're Jash and Mahimana, cofounders of Flywheel AI ( https://useflywheel.ai ). We’re building a remote teleop and autonomous stack for excavators. Here's a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCNmNm3lQGk . Interfacing with existing excavators for enabling remote teleop (or autonomy) is hard. Unlike cars which use drive-by-wire technology, most of the millions of excavators are fully hydraulic machines. The joysticks are connected to a pilot hydraulic circuit, which proportionally moves the cylinders in the main hydraulic circuit which ultimately moves the excavator joints. This means excavators mostly do not have an electronic component to control the joints. We solve this by mechanically actuating the joysticks and pedals inside the excavators. We do this with retrofits which w

title_i18n.en: Launch HN: Flywheel (YC S25) – Waymo for Excavators
title_i18n.zh: HN发布：Flywheel（YC S25）——挖掘机界的Waymo
title_i18n.es: Presentación en HN: Flywheel (YC S25) — El Waymo de las excavadoras

excerpt_i18n.en:
Hey HN,
We're Jash and Mahimana, cofounders of Flywheel AI ( https://useflywheel.ai ). We’re building a remote teleop and autonomous stack for excavators. Here's a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCNmNm3lQGk . Interfacing with existing excavators for enabling remote teleop (or autonomy) is hard. Unlike cars which use drive-by-wire technology, most of the millions of excavators are fully hydraulic machines. The joysticks are connected to a pilot hydraulic circuit, which proportionally moves the cylinders in the main hydraulic circuit which ultimately moves the excavator joints. This means excavators mostly do not have an electronic component to control the joints. We solve this by mechanically actuating the joysticks and pedals inside the excavators. We do this with retrofits which w
excerpt_i18n.zh:
各位 HN 网友：
我们是 Flywheel AI（https://useflywheel.ai）的联合创始人 Jash 和 Mahimana。我们正在为挖掘机构建远程遥操作与自动驾驶系统。演示视频：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCNmNm3lQGk。
excerpt_i18n.es:
Hola HN,
Somos Jash y Mahimana, cofundadores de Flywheel AI ( https://useflywheel.ai ). Estamos desarrollando un sistema de teleoperación remota y pila autónoma para excavadoras. Aquí tenéis un vídeo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCNmNm3lQGk . Int

items.title: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
items.raw_excerpt: Canada’s role as a leader in artificial intelligence was on full display at this week’s All In Canada AI Ecosystem event. NVIDIA Vice President of Generative AI Software Kari Briski today joined Canada’s Minister of Artificial Intelligence and Digital Innovation Evan Solomon and Aiden Gomez, cofounder and CEO of Cohere, in a special address moderated Read Article

title_i18n.en: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
title_i18n.zh: 加拿大全力投入人工智能：NVIDIA与各国技术领袖齐聚蒙特利尔共商主权AI战略
title_i18n.es: Canadá apuesta fuerte por la IA: NVIDIA se une a los líderes tecnológicos del país en Montreal para moldear la estrategia de IA soberana.

excerpt_i18n.en: Canada’s role as a leader in artificial intelligence was on full display at this week’s All In Canada AI Ecosystem event. NVIDIA Vice President of Generative AI Software Kari Briski today joined Canada’s Minister of Artificial Intelligence and Digital Innovation Evan Solomon and Aiden Gomez, cofounder and CEO of Cohere, in a special address moderated Read Article
excerpt_i18n.zh: 加拿大在本周"全境人工智能生态系统"活动中充分展现了其人工智能领域的领导地位。英伟达生成式AI软件副总裁卡里·布里斯基今日与加拿大艺术部长共同出席活动。
excerpt_i18n.es: El papel de Canadá como líder en inteligencia artificial quedó plenamente demostrado en el evento All In Canada AI Ecosystem de esta semana. Kari Briski, vicepresidenta de Software de Inteligencia Artificial Generativa de NVIDIA, se unió hoy a la ministra de Arti de Canadá

items.title: A Former Apple Luminary Sets Out to Create the Ultimate GPU Software
items.raw_excerpt: Demand for AI chips is booming—and so is the need for software to run them. Chris Lattner’s startup Modular just raised $250 million to build the best developer tools for AI hardware.

title_i18n.en: A Former Apple Luminary Sets Out to Create the Ultimate GPU Software
title_i18n.zh: 前苹果杰出人物着手打造终极GPU软件
title_i18n.es: Un exlumbrante de Apple se propone crear el software de GPU definitivo

excerpt_i18n.en: Demand for AI chips is booming—and so is the need for software to run them. Chris Lattner’s startup Modular just raised $250 million to build the best developer tools for AI hardware.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 人工智能芯片需求激增，运行芯片的软件需求也随之高涨。克里斯·拉特纳的初创公司Modular刚融资2.5亿美元，旨在为AI硬件打造最优秀的开发者工具。
excerpt_i18n.es: La demanda de chips de IA está en auge, y también lo es la necesidad de software para ejecutarlos. La startup de Chris Lattner, Modular, acaba de recaudar 250 millones de dólares para crear las mejores herramientas de desarrollo para hardware de IA.

items.title: Gemini Robotics 1.5 brings AI agents into the physical world

excerpt_i18n.es: Una nueva era de agentes físicos ayudará a los robots a percibir, planificar, pensar, utilizar herramientas y actuar para resolver tareas complejas.

items.title: Launch HN: Webhound (YC S23) – Research agent that builds datasets from the web
items.raw_excerpt: We're the team behind Webhound ( https://webhound.ai ), an AI agent that builds datasets from the web based on natural language prompts. You describe what you're trying to find. The agent figures out how to structure the data and where to look, then searches, extracts the results, and outputs everything in a CSV you can export. We've set up a special no-signup version for the HN community at https://hn.webhound.ai - just click "Continue as Guest" to try it without signing up. Here's a demo: https://youtu.be/fGaRfPdK1Sk We started building it after getting tired of doing this kind of research manually. Open 50 tabs, copy everything into a spreadsheet, realize it's inconsistent, start over. It felt like something an LLM should be able to handle. Some examples of how people have used it in th

We've set up a special no-signup version for the HN community at https://hn.webhound.ai - just click "Continue as Guest" to try it without signing up. Open 50 tabs, copy everything into a spreadsheet, realize it's inconsistent, start over. It felt like something an LLM should be able to handle. Some examples of how people have used it in th

excerpt_i18n.zh: 整装待发，直冲云端。热门第三人称射击游戏《机甲突破》现已在GeForce NOW平台上线，搭载英伟达DLSS 4技术。本周共有10款新作加入近5000款游戏阵容，敬请把握体验时机。
excerpt_i18n.es: Prepárate y dirígete a la nube. Mecha BREAK, el popular shooter en tercera persona, ya está disponible para transmitir en GeForce NOW con tecnología NVIDIA DLSS 4. Disfrútalo esta semana como parte de los 10 nuevos títulos que se unen a los casi 5.000

items.title: 吴泳铭掌舵两年，阿里AI起飞
items.raw_excerpt: 9 月 24 日下午，云栖小镇 D2-9 场馆，一场以 1688 AI 为主题的论坛开场。场馆面积不小，但将近 3 小时的分享，座位早早被占满，后排空地也被人群挤得寸步难行。 热度不仅限于这一场。 不论是在硬核技术主题论坛，还是充满机器人、汽车的应用馆，四处人头攒动。 一位连续多年参会的从业者笑言：“今年的云栖大会场馆是前脚掌踩后脚跟，比过去几年都热闹。” 一位理想员工发微博说，本是一个产业链产品技术的交流会议，没想到工作人员反馈，现场收获了相当可观的线索和订单。 今年是云栖大会举办的第 10 个年头，每年的云栖大会都是了解最新技术趋势的窗口。随着大模型技术的发展，这几年的云栖大会成为了 AI 行业的风向标，也是观察阿里在云与 AI 战略上下一步棋的绝佳场合。 执掌阿里两年来，阿里巴巴集团CEO吴泳铭反复强调“用户为先，AI驱动”战略，他旗帜鲜明地提出，AI技术对所有行业的改变升级以及AI与云计算的深度结合，是未来十年技术领域最大的行业机会。 在阿里内部，阿里全方位践行AI投入承诺并收获成效。 不仅是阿里云，高德、钉钉等业务也全面AI化，在AI to C领域，阿里发布首款自研AI眼镜夸克AI眼镜。电商业务中，AI工具“全站推广”持续带动淘天商家经营效率提升，在商家的渗透率连续多季持续提升。淘宝使用大模型让“猜你喜欢”更精准，测试显示用户加购次数和停留时长均提升超5%。阿里巴巴国际站的商家也采用AI驱动工具用于市场营销、采购和产品上架。 今年云栖大会上，一场开场23分钟的演讲让阿里市值狂飙，这位技术派掌门人又释放了哪些信号？阿里在 AI 云赛道的两年变革，又如何在这里得到印证？ 从云栖大会，看阿里AI路线 今年雷峰网参加云栖大会最大的感受是，大模型浪潮奔涌两年后，阿里对AI路线规划愈发清晰。 论坛第一天，阿里CEO吴泳铭在演讲中，有一个核心关键词不断被提及：ASI，即超级人工

title_i18n.zh: 吴泳铭掌舵两年，阿里AI起飞
title_i18n.en: Wu Yongming has been at the helm for two years, and Alibaba's AI has taken off.
title_i18n.es: Tras dos años bajo el mando de Wu Yongming, el impulso de la IA de Alibaba despega.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9 月 24 日下午，云栖小镇 D2-9 场馆，一场以 1688 AI 为主题的论坛开场。场馆面积不小，但将近 3 小时的分享，座位早早被占满，后排空地也被人群挤得寸步难行。 热度不仅限于这一场。 不论是在硬核技术主题论坛，还是充满机器人、汽车的应用馆，四处人头攒动。 一位连续多年参会的从业者笑言：“今年的云栖大会场馆是前脚掌踩后脚跟，比过去几年都热闹。” 一位理想员工发微博说，本是一个产业链产品技术的交流会议，没想到工作人员反馈，现场收获了相当可观的线索和订单。 今年是云栖大会举办的第 10 个年头，每年的云栖大会都是了解最新技术趋势的窗口。随着大模型技术的发展，这几年的云栖大会成为了 AI 行业的风向标，也是观察阿里在云与 AI 战略上下一步棋的绝佳场合。 执掌阿里两年来，阿里巴巴集团CEO吴泳铭反复强调“用户为先，AI驱动”战略，他旗帜鲜明地提出，AI技术对所有行业的改变升级以及AI与云计算的深度结合，是未来十年技术领域最大的行业机会。 在阿里内部，阿里全方位践行AI投入承诺并收获成效。 不仅是阿里云，高德、钉钉等业务也全面AI化，在AI to C领域，阿里发布首款自研AI眼镜夸克AI眼镜。电商业务中，AI工具“全站推广”持续带动淘天商家经营效率提升，在商家的渗透率连续多季持续提升。淘宝使用大模型让“猜你喜欢”更精准，测试显示用户加购次数和停留时长均提升超5%。阿里巴巴国际站的商家也采用AI驱动工具用于市场营销、采购和产品上架。 今年云栖大会上，一场开场23分钟的演讲让阿里市值狂飙，这位技术派掌门人又释放了哪些信号？阿里在 AI 云赛道的两年变革，又如何在这里得到印证？ 从云栖大会，看阿里AI路线 今年雷峰网参加云栖大会最大的感受是，大模型浪潮奔涌两年后，阿里对AI路线规划愈发清晰。 论坛第一天，阿里CEO吴泳铭在演讲中，有一个核心关键词不断被提及：ASI，即超级人工
excerpt_i18n.en: On the afternoon of September 24, a forum themed around 1688 AI kicked off at the D2-9 venue in Yunqi Town. The venue was spacious, but nearly three hours into the event, seats were fully occupied early on, and the standing area at the back was packed to the point of being impassable. The buzz wasn't limited to this session alone. Whether at forums focused on hardcore technology or exhibition halls filled with robots and cars, crowds were everywhere. A veteran attendee joked, "This year's Yunqi Conference is so crowded you're stepping on heels—it's livelier than in previous years." An employee from Li Auto posted on Weibo that what started as an industry chain product and tech exchange unexpectedly generated significant leads and orders on-site, according to staff feedback. This year marks the 10th anniversary of the Yunqi Conference, an annual event that serves as a window into the latest tech trends. With the advancement of large model technology, recent editions have become a barometer for the AI industry and a prime opportunity to observe Alibaba's next moves in cloud and AI strategy. Since taking the helm at Alibaba two years ago, Group CEO Wu Yongming has repeatedly emphasized the "user-first, AI-driven" strategy, clearly stating that AI's transformative impact across all industries and its deep integration with cloud computing represent the biggest opportunity in the tech sector over the next decade. Internally, Alibaba is fully committed to its AI investment, yielding results. Beyond Alibaba Cloud, businesses like Amap and DingTalk are also undergoing comprehensive AI integration. In the AI-to-C domain, Alibaba launched its first self-developed AI glasses, Kua.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 24 de septiembre por la tarde, comenzó un foro sobre 1688 AI en el pabellón D2-9 de Yunqi Town. Aunque el espacio era amplio, casi 3 horas de presentaciones hicieron que los asientos se ocuparan pronto y las zonas traseras quedaran abarrotadas. El entusiasmo no se limitó a este evento. Tanto en foros técnicos especializados como en pabellones de aplicaciones con robots y coches, había multitudes por todas partes. Un asistente habitual comentó con humor: "Este año en Yunqi Conference la gente está tan apretada que no cabe un alfiler, más animado que en años anteriores". Un empleado de Li Auto publicó en Weibo que, siendo originalmente una conferencia de intercambio tecnológico para productos de la cadena de suministro, el personal informó que el sitio

items.title: 海康威视：做得好安防，能否做得好工业？
items.raw_excerpt: 作者丨路遥 编辑丨余快 近日中国国际工业博览会上，不少人恍然：海康入局工业了。 其实，从大众熟知的安防领域，到深入工业的“毛细血管”，海康的工业路，已悄悄走了十余年。 过去的海康，以安防立身，以智能物联为千行百业搭台而闻名。 如今，它进一步沉到制造现场，为制造业带来的不仅是一个个场景的智能化改变，更拓展了价值创造的更多可能。 因此，海康面临的一大课题在于，如何进一步扎实根基，让自身的工业能力始终保持鲜活与独特。 在千行百业的场景中持续思考与实践，造就了海康当下的技术优势，并将深刻影响其未来所能创造价值的深度与广度。 对于工业，刚刚亮相中国国际工业博览会的海康，已给出明确回应：携“物联感知+AI”，扎进工业深处。 工博会上，上百款软硬件产品、海康观澜大模型具体场景应用一起登场，这不是试水，而是展示了其综合能力的重要一隅。 那么，什么是“物联感知+AI”？做得好安防的海康，能否做得好工业？ 海康做工业，一场技术和市场的双向奔赴 提及海康，多数人的第一印象仍是“安防巨头”，但早在2015年，它就攥着工业相机这把钥匙，悄悄推开了工业领域的大门。 海康做工业，绝非“跨界跟风”，而是技术积累到一定阶段的自然破局。 事实上，工业是海康技术能力开花结果的“新战场”，在安防领域打磨的可见光、红外、X光、声波等感知技术，恰好与工业场景的数字化需求高度契合。 安防要“看清异常”，工业要“感知数据”；安防要“智能预警”，工业要“预测性维护”，二者都既需要感知，又需要智能。 20余年来，从可见光起步，一路拓展至X光、紫外、红外、毫米波、激光、融合光谱、声波等多维感知，构建起覆盖30000多种硬件型号的“产品矩阵”，可以给机器装上“眼耳鼻舌”，设备振动、物料温度、产品缺陷、物质成分等，都能被转化为可分析的数字数据，解决工业“物理世界数字化”的核心痛点。 市场端，中国工业也正面临着“数字化饥渴”。 中国

title_i18n.zh: 海康威视：做得好安防，能否做得好工业？
title_i18n.en: Hikvision: Excelling in security, can it succeed in the industrial sector?
title_i18n.es: Hikvision: Si lo hace bien en seguridad, ¿podrá hacerlo bien en la industria?

excerpt_i18n.zh: 作者丨路遥 编辑丨余快 近日中国国际工业博览会上，不少人恍然：海康入局工业了。 其实，从大众熟知的安防领域，到深入工业的“毛细血管”，海康的工业路，已悄悄走了十余年。 过去的海康，以安防立身，以智能物联为千行百业搭台而闻名。 如今，它进一步沉到制造现场，为制造业带来的不仅是一个个场景的智能化改变，更拓展了价值创造的更多可能。 因此，海康面临的一大课题在于，如何进一步扎实根基，让自身的工业能力始终保持鲜活与独特。 在千行百业的场景中持续思考与实践，造就了海康当下的技术优势，并将深刻影响其未来所能创造价值的深度与广度。 对于工业，刚刚亮相中国国际工业博览会的海康，已给出明确回应：携“物联感知+AI”，扎进工业深处。 工博会上，上百款软硬件产品、海康观澜大模型具体场景应用一起登场，这不是试水，而是展示了其综合能力的重要一隅。 那么，什么是“物联感知+AI”？做得好安防的海康，能否做得好工业？ 海康做工业，一场技术和市场的双向奔赴 提及海康，多数人的第一印象仍是“安防巨头”，但早在2015年，它就攥着工业相机这把钥匙，悄悄推开了工业领域的大门。 海康做工业，绝非“跨界跟风”，而是技术积累到一定阶段的自然破局。 事实上，工业是海康技术能力开花结果的“新战场”，在安防领域打磨的可见光、红外、X光、声波等感知技术，恰好与工业场景的数字化需求高度契合。 安防要“看清异常”，工业要“感知数据”；安防要“智能预警”，工业要“预测性维护”，二者都既需要感知，又需要智能。 20余年来，从可见光起步，一路拓展至X光、紫外、红外、毫米波、激光、融合光谱、声波等多维感知，构建起覆盖30000多种硬件型号的“产品矩阵”，可以给机器装上“眼耳鼻舌”，设备振动、物料温度、产品缺陷、物质成分等，都能被转化为可分析的数字数据，解决工业“物理世界数字化”的核心痛点。 市场端，中国工业也正面临着“数字化饥渴”。 中国
excerpt_i18n.en:
Author: Lu Yao  Editor: Yu Kuai  
At the recent China International Industry Fair, many were surprised to realize that Hikvision has entered the industrial sector. In fact, Hikvision has quietly been on this industrial path for over a decade, transitioning from its well-known security domain to penetrating the intricate "capillaries" of industry.  
Previously known for establishing itself in security and building platforms with smart IoT for various sectors, Hikvision is now delving deeper into manufacturing sites. It brings not only intelligent transformations to individual scenarios but also expands the possibilities for value creation.  
A key challenge for Hikvision is how to solidify its foundation further, ensuring its industrial capabilities remain dynamic and distinctive. Continuous reflection and practice across diverse industrial scenarios have shaped Hikvision’s current technological edge, which will profoundly influence the depth and breadth of value it can generate in the future.  
At the Industry Fair, Hikvision made a clear statement about its industrial ambitions: diving deep into industry with "IoT sensing + AI." Showcasing over a hundred hardware and software products, along with specific applications of its Guanlan large model, this was not a tentative step but a display of a significant part of its comprehensive capabilities.  
So, what is "IoT sensing + AI"? Can Hikvision, excelling in security, succeed in industry?  
Hikvision’s move into industry represents a convergence of technology and market forces. While most still see it as a "security giant," as early as 2015, it was already quietly entering the industrial field with industrial cameras as its key. This is not a case of "jumping on the bandwagon" but the result of accumulated technological expertise.
excerpt_i18n.es: Autor: Lu Yao. Editor: Yu Kuai. Recientemente, en la Feria Internacional de la Industria de China, muchos se dieron cuenta: Hikvision ha entrado en el sector industrial. En realidad, desde el conocido campo de la seguridad hasta adentrarse en los "capilares" de la industria, el camino industrial de Hikvision ha sido recorrido en silencio durante más de diez años. En el pasado, Hikvision se consolidó con la seguridad y se hizo famosa por conectar múltiples industrias con la internet de las cosas inteligente. Hoy, se sumerge aún más en el entorno manufacturero, aportando no solo cambios inteligentes en diversos escenarios, sino también expandiendo las posibilidades de creación de valor. Por lo tanto, un gran desafío para Hikvision es cómo consolidar aún más sus bases, manteniendo siempre su capacidad industrial fresca y única. Reflexionando continuamente en los escenarios de múltiples industrias.

It had to go, he thought, if it had any chance of surviving. Wehr, who’s 26, isn’t from Greenland—he grew up in Germany—but he had become obsessed with the island, an autonomous Danish territory,…
excerpt_i18n.zh: 四年前肯尼斯·韦尔开始管理格陵兰语版维基百科时，他的首个举措是删除了几乎所有内容。这位26岁的管理者认为，若想保留这个语言版本，就必须彻底清理。
excerpt_i18n.es: Cuando Kenneth Wehr empezó a gestionar la versión en groenlandés de Wikipedia hace cuatro años, su primer acto fue borrar casi todo. Tenía que desaparecer, pensó, si quería que tuviera alguna posibilidad de sobrevivir. Wehr, que tiene 26 años,

items.title: 天猫精灵未来酒店4.0发布，AI Agent联盟开启酒店智能新纪元
items.raw_excerpt: 2025云栖大会上，天猫精灵未来酒店4.0的三大AI解决方案与“未来酒店AI Agent联盟”的成立，标志着酒店业从单点智能迈向全域智能，一场以生态共赢为核心的产业变革正式开启。 2025年9月24日，杭州云栖小镇国际会展中心，天猫精灵未来酒店在2025云栖大会上重磅发布未来酒店4.0，包括AI驱动的桌面营销系统、颠覆传统话机的音箱新通话、多智能体协作的超级AI助理团队等三大核心解决方案，助力酒店行业从“功能智能”向“场景智能”跃迁。 发布会上，天猫精灵未来酒店还携手德胧集团、首旅如家、钉钉酒旅、比利信息、美宿在途等生态伙伴，共同发起“未来酒店AI Agent联盟”，致力于共创技术标准、共建开放生态、共享智能红利。 行业困局，酒店业亟待打破传统模式枷锁 据《2025中国酒店业发展报告》显示，截至2024年底，国内酒店连锁化率回落至40.09%，行业正从高速增长转入高质量发展。中国酒店业正身处“规模泡沫”与“价值深耕”的十字路口。 同时，人力成本持续攀升，传统服务模式效率低下；用户需求日益碎片化，Z世代消费者追求沉浸式体验；行业利润增长乏力，降本增效仍是核心挑战。“酒店业需要从规模数量竞争转向价值密度竞争，即每间房承载的数智化含量、文化体验和运营效率决定生死。”行业报告指出。 天猫精灵破局，三大方案直击行业痛点 天猫精灵未来酒店4.0的三大解决方案，分别针对酒店业的收入增长、服务体验和运营效率痛点，提供了全面升级的路径。 AI驱动的桌面营销系统，重构酒店的收入模式：系统能通过智能推荐引擎覆盖用户和酒店服务场景，实现真正匹配用户潜在需求的精准营销，为酒店创造更多非房收入。 颠覆传统话机的音箱新通话，重塑客户服务体验：搭载阿里巴巴通义大模型技术，实现更自然的语音交互，让住客通过一句话就能完成服务请求，响应率高达98%。 多智能体协作的超级AI助理团队，突破运营效率瓶颈：通过多个A

title_i18n.zh: 天猫精灵未来酒店4.0发布，AI Agent联盟开启酒店智能新纪元
title_i18n.en: Tmall Genie Future Hotel 4.0 Launches, AI Agent Alliance Ushers in a New Era of Hotel Intelligence.
title_i18n.es: Tmall Genie Future Hotel 4.0 se lanza, la Alianza de Agentes de IA inicia una nueva era de inteligencia hotelera.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 2025云栖大会上，天猫精灵未来酒店4.0的三大AI解决方案与“未来酒店AI Agent联盟”的成立，标志着酒店业从单点智能迈向全域智能，一场以生态共赢为核心的产业变革正式开启。 2025年9月24日，杭州云栖小镇国际会展中心，天猫精灵未来酒店在2025云栖大会上重磅发布未来酒店4.0，包括AI驱动的桌面营销系统、颠覆传统话机的音箱新通话、多智能体协作的超级AI助理团队等三大核心解决方案，助力酒店行业从“功能智能”向“场景智能”跃迁。 发布会上，天猫精灵未来酒店还携手德胧集团、首旅如家、钉钉酒旅、比利信息、美宿在途等生态伙伴，共同发起“未来酒店AI Agent联盟”，致力于共创技术标准、共建开放生态、共享智能红利。 行业困局，酒店业亟待打破传统模式枷锁 据《2025中国酒店业发展报告》显示，截至2024年底，国内酒店连锁化率回落至40.09%，行业正从高速增长转入高质量发展。中国酒店业正身处“规模泡沫”与“价值深耕”的十字路口。 同时，人力成本持续攀升，传统服务模式效率低下；用户需求日益碎片化，Z世代消费者追求沉浸式体验；行业利润增长乏力，降本增效仍是核心挑战。“酒店业需要从规模数量竞争转向价值密度竞争，即每间房承载的数智化含量、文化体验和运营效率决定生死。”行业报告指出。 天猫精灵破局，三大方案直击行业痛点 天猫精灵未来酒店4.0的三大解决方案，分别针对酒店业的收入增长、服务体验和运营效率痛点，提供了全面升级的路径。 AI驱动的桌面营销系统，重构酒店的收入模式：系统能通过智能推荐引擎覆盖用户和酒店服务场景，实现真正匹配用户潜在需求的精准营销，为酒店创造更多非房收入。 颠覆传统话机的音箱新通话，重塑客户服务体验：搭载阿里巴巴通义大模型技术，实现更自然的语音交互，让住客通过一句话就能完成服务请求，响应率高达98%。 多智能体协作的超级AI助理团队，突破运营效率瓶颈：通过多个A
excerpt_i18n.en:
At the 2025 Yunqi Conference, Tmall Genie Future Hotel 4.0's three major AI solutions and the establishment of the "Future Hotel AI Agent Alliance" marked the hotel industry's shift from single-point intelligence to comprehensive intelligence, initiating an industry transformation centered on ecosystem collaboration. On September 24, 2025, at the Hangzhou Yunqi Town International Convention and Exhibition Center, Tmall Genie Future Hotel unveiled Future Hotel 4.0 at the 2025 Yunqi Conference, featuring three core solutions: an AI-driven desktop marketing system, a speaker-based new calling system that replaces traditional phones, and a multi-agent collaborative super AI assistant team, helping the hotel industry transition from "functional intelligence" to "scenario intelligence." During the launch, Tmall Genie Future Hotel also partnered with Delonix Group, BTG Homeinns, DingTalk Travel, Billy Info, and Meisu Zait to establish the "Future Hotel AI Agent Alliance," committed to co-creating technical standards, building an open ecosystem, and sharing intelligent benefits. 

Industry challenges: The hotel sector urgently needs to break free from traditional models. According to the "2025 China Hotel Industry Development Report," by the end of 2024, the domestic hotel chain rate had dropped to 40.09%, indicating a shift from rapid growth to high-quality development. China's hotel industry stands at a crossroads between "scale bubbles" and "value refinement." Meanwhile, labor costs continue to rise, traditional service models remain inefficient, user demands are increasingly fragmented, Gen Z consumers seek immersive experiences, and industry profit growth is sluggish, with cost reduction and efficiency improvement remaining core challenges. The hotel industry must move beyond competition based on scale and quantity.
excerpt_i18n.es: En la Cumbre de la Nube 2025, las tres soluciones de IA del Hotel del Futuro 4.0 de Tmall Genie y el establecimiento de la "Alianza de Agentes de IA para Hoteles del Futuro" marcan la transición de la industria hotelera de la inteligencia puntual a la inteligencia integral, iniciando una transformación industrial centrada en la colaboración ecológica. El 24 de septiembre de 2025, en el Centro Internacional de Convenciones y Exposiciones de Cloud Town en Hangzhou, Tmall Genie presentó el Hotel del Futuro 4.0 durante la Cumbre de la Nube, incluyendo tres soluciones clave: un sistema de marketing de escritorio impulsado por IA, un nuevo sistema de comunicación por altavoz que revoluciona los teléfonos tradicionales y un equipo de asistente superinteligente con colaboración multiagente, facilitando la evolución de la industria hotelera de la "inteligencia funcional" a la "inteligencia contextual".

items.title: Meta Poaches OpenAI Scientist to Help Lead AI Lab
items.raw_excerpt: Yang Song, who previously led the strategic explorations team at OpenAI, is the new “research principal” of Meta Superintelligence Labs.

title_i18n.en: Meta Poaches OpenAI Scientist to Help Lead AI Lab
title_i18n.zh: Meta挖角OpenAI科学家协助领导人工智能实验室。
title_i18n.es: Meta ficha a un científico de OpenAI para ayudar a dirigir el laboratorio de inteligencia artificial

excerpt_i18n.en: Yang Song, who previously led the strategic explorations team at OpenAI, is the new “research principal” of Meta Superintelligence Labs.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 杨松此前负责OpenAI战略探索团队，现为Meta超级智能实验室研究负责人。
excerpt_i18n.es: Yang Song, quien anteriormente dirigió el equipo de exploraciones estratégicas en OpenAI, es el nuevo "investigador principal" de Meta Superintelligence Labs.

items.title: Introducing ChatGPT Pulse
items.raw_excerpt: Today we're releasing a preview of ChatGPT Pulse to Pro users on mobile. Pulse is a new experience where ChatGPT proactively does research to deliver personalized updates based on your chats, feedback, and connected apps like your calendar.

title_i18n.en: Introducing ChatGPT Pulse
title_i18n.zh: 推出ChatGPT脉搏
title_i18n.es: Presentando ChatGPT Pulse

excerpt_i18n.en: Today we're releasing a preview of ChatGPT Pulse to Pro users on mobile. Pulse is a new experience where ChatGPT proactively does research to deliver personalized updates based on your chats, feedback, and connected apps like your calendar.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 今日我们面向移动端Pro用户推出ChatGPT Pulse预览版。Pulse是一种新体验，ChatGPT会主动研究您的对话记录、反馈及关联应用，据此提供个性化更新。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hoy lanzamos una vista previa de ChatGPT Pulse para usuarios Pro en móviles. Pulse es una nueva experiencia donde ChatGPT investiga de forma proactiva para ofrecerte actualizaciones personalizadas basadas en tus chats, comentarios y aplicaciones conectadas.

items.title: Transforming the manufacturing industry with ChatGPT
items.raw_excerpt: By deploying ChatGPT Enterprise, ENEOS Materials transformed operations with faster research, safer plant design, and streamlined HR processes. Over 80% of employees report major workflow improvements, strengthening competitiveness in manufacturing.

title_i18n.en: Transforming the manufacturing industry with ChatGPT
title_i18n.zh: 利用ChatGPT变革制造业
title_i18n.es: Transformando la industria manufacturera con ChatGPT

excerpt_i18n.en: By deploying ChatGPT Enterprise, ENEOS Materials transformed operations with faster research, safer plant design, and streamlined HR processes. Over 80% of employees report major workflow improvements, strengthening competitiveness in manufacturing.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 通过部署ChatGPT企业版，ENEOS材料公司实现了运营转型：加速研发进程、提升工厂设计安全性并优化人力资源流程。超过80%的员工反馈工作流程显著改善，从而增强了企业竞争力。
excerpt_i18n.es: Al implementar ChatGPT Enterprise, ENEOS Materials transformó sus operaciones con una investigación más rápida, un diseño de plantas más seguro y procesos de RR. HH. optimizados. Más del 80 % de los empleados informan de mejoras significativas en los flujos de trabajo, lo que fortalece la competitividad.
